Image formats supported by Archiver archives

High-quality images and audio files are often too large to send. With Archiver you can create archives that will reduce your image and music files so you can share them quickly and easily.

Image formats supported by Archiver archives:

pictpic
pctjpg
psfepsi
epsfjpeg
8bpsgiff
tpicjpe
mpohdr
exrjps
macpnt
pntgpng
rgbsgi
argagif
tgacur
xbmjp2
bmpico
psdjpf
orfmrw
rwltif
rw2raw
rafdng
crwicns
efxcr2
jfaxjfx
g3mos
faxtiff
dcrfff
erfarw
sr23fr
srfsrw
pefnef
nrw
